title: Voat has died at 11:25 PM EST on December 24th, 2020 (next day for many others). You can no longer access it.

body:
And it affected Ruqqus not at all, other than half-assed new rules and admin oversteps against freedom of speech...not that Voat's demise actually threatened us in any way.

"Censorship free" my ass, more than half of all guilds on Ruqqus are currently shadow-banned and admins aren't reversing it.

body:
>Come on

^Ranked up there with "Really man?" for utterly useless phrases that indicate only that the speaker has absolutely no basis for their opinions but is insulted to discover facts are not what they would prefer.

Click "Discover guilds", sort by size, jump to page 22 out of 220. Check out five, ten, twenty, whatever sample size you trust.

Yes, more than half.
body_html:
Come on

Yes, more than half.
